name: Merino Wool Yarn
description: Soft and warm, perfect for cozy scarves and sweaters.

name: Cotton Yarn
description: Lightweight and breathable, ideal for summer projects.

name: Alpaca Yarn
description: Luxuriously soft and hypoallergenic, great for winter accessories.

name: Silk Yarn
description: Smooth and shiny, ideal for delicate and drapey items.

name: Acrylic Yarn
description: Affordable and durable, a great all-purpose yarn.

name: Linen Yarn
description: Strong and cool, perfect for summer garments.

name: Bamboo Yarn
description: Eco-friendly and soft, ideal for lightweight projects.

name: Cashmere Yarn
description: Extremely soft and luxurious, perfect for scarves and shawls.

name: Mohair Yarn
description: Fluffy and warm, ideal for creating airy and textured knits.

name: Wool Blend Yarn
description: A mix of wool and other fibers, combining durability with warmth.
